de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction.cluster

Class ClusterIntersectionSimilarityFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction.cluster.ClusterIntersectionSimilarityFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistanceFunction<Cluster<?>>, PrimitiveDistanceFunction<Cluster<?>>, PrimitiveSimilarityFunction<Cluster<?>>, SimilarityFunction<Cluster<?>>

    public class ClusterIntersectionSimilarityFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrimitiveDistanceFunction<Cluster<?>>, PrimitiveSimilarityFunction<Cluster<?>>
    Measure the similarity of clusters via the intersection size.
    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
